name: Astronomicon
description:
In this atmospheric puzzle game, you're playing as a navigator of a small caravel led by the stars. Study the constellations and find your way in the endless ocean.

Developer's note: due to time constraints, the game only features six stages (constellations).

IMPORTANT: 
To avoid a game crashing bug, after completing a stage, please:

  1. Go to the main menu by pressing 'escape';
  2. Press 'start' and continue with the game.

I can't re-upload a fixed version before the jam ends. Sorry about that!
